📸 Mom's Perfect Spaghetti & Meatballs - Styled Photo

Mom's Perfect Spaghetti & Meatballs

👤 by Linda M. Trusted Partner ⭐ 4.9 (234 reviews) 98% Success Rate
⏱️ Prep: 15 min 🔥 Cook: 30 min 👥 Serves: 4-6 Easy

🎯 Why This Recipe Works

This family recipe has been perfected over 20 years and tested by over 200 home cooks. The secret is in the technique - proper browning of meatballs and the perfect sauce-to-pasta ratio. Follow each step exactly for guaranteed delicious results!

📋 Ingredients

Ground beef (80/20 blend) 1 lb
Spaghetti pasta 1 lb
Marinara sauce (quality brand) 24 oz
Plain breadcrumbs 1/2 cup
Large egg 1

👨‍🍳 Instructions

1

Bring a large pot of salted water to boil. Use about 6 quarts of water for 1 lb pasta.

💡 Success Tip: Plenty of water prevents sticking and ensures even cooking.
2

Mix ground beef, breadcrumbs, egg, and 1/2 tsp salt. Roll into 1.5-inch meatballs.

💡 Success Tip: Don't overmix - this keeps meatballs tender.
3

Brown meatballs in large skillet over medium heat, 8-10 minutes total.

💡 Success Tip: Don't overcrowd - cook in batches for even browning.

🌟 Recent Success Stories

"Made this for the first time and it was perfect! Even my picky teenagers loved it." - Sarah M.
"Finally found a meatball recipe that actually works. Made it 3 times already!" - Mike R.
